import pandas as pd
import numpy as snp
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib
matplotlib.rcParams['figure.figsize'] = (10,10)
sns.set_style('whitegrid')

sns.kdeplot(df.groupby('sex').get_group('F')['age'], shade = True, label = 'female')
plt.xlabel('data range')
plt.ylabel('% data distribution')
plt.show()

plt.figure(figsize = (20,50))
for i,item in enumerate(['school', 'sex', 'famsize', 'Pstatus', 'Mjob', 'Fjob',
       'reason', 'guardian', 'schoolsup', 'famsup', 'paid', 'activities',
       'nursery', 'higher', 'internet', 'romantic']):
    plt.subplot(9,2,i+1)
    sns.countplot(df[item])
    plt.title(item)

plt.show()
source.919c44cd:
plt.figure(figsize= (15,10))
plt.subplot(1,2,1)
order_by = df.groupby('Fjob')['G1'].median().sort_values(ascending = False).index
sns.boxplot(x = df['Fjob'], y = df['G1'],order = order_by)
plt.xticks(rotation = 90)
plt.title('Fjob v/s G1')

plt.subplot(1,2,2)
order_by = df.groupby('Mjob')['G1'].median().sort_values(ascending = False).index
sns.boxplot(x = df['Mjob'], y = df['G1'],order = order_by)
plt.xticks(rotation = 90)
plt.title('Mjob v/s G1')

plt.show()

source.9d8c1be9:
plt.figure(figsize = (15,15))
for i, item in enumerate(['schoolsup', 'famsup', 'paid', 'activities',
       'nursery', 'higher', 'internet', 'romantic']):
    plt.subplot(4,2,i+1)
    order_by = df.groupby(item)['G1'].median().sort_values(ascending = False).index
    sns.boxplot(x = df[item], y = df['G1'],order = order_by)
    plt.xticks(rotation = 90)
    plt.title(item+' v/s G1')
source.e27517b8:
# How to start analysing

- First it will be better to think in terms of graphical analysis.

- I consider three things which I think will be very useful for beginners-
  * If numerical variable--> line plots
  * If one single variable numerical distribution---> histograms and kde plots
  * if one numerical column and one categorcal variable---> box plots
  * If categorical variable---> Bar plots
  * If numerical variable and one more categorical criterion--> scatter plots
  
- So this is a starter notebook you can see it than put your notebook in notebooks.

- If you have opened this notebook means you are pretty familiar with datascience so it may possible and I hope you will be   putting better version of this notebook:)

- "upvote karo bhaiyo aur unki beheno tabhi to bhai ki notebook chalegi":p(Please upvote it)
